alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Halifax; Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 2:49AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Warren, Halifax and northeastern Franklin Counties through 345 AM EDT... At 248 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Warrenton, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Roanoke Rapids, Halifax, Enfield, Weldon, Centerville, Glenview, Medoc Mountain State Park, Tillery, Arcola and South Weldon. This includes Interstate 95 near Mile Marker 78, near Mile Marker 79, near Mile Marker 80, near Mile Marker 81, near Mile Marker 82, near Mile Marker 83, and between Mile Markers 151 and 173. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
